events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to request a refund because the product did not meet my expectations and I no longer want to keep it.
The customer's message has been reviewed and the case is now classified under Refund due to request for money back.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle this case and will respond shortly to assist the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your refund request and make this process as smooth as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you wish to return the product so we can proceed with your refund?
My order number is 123456789. The item was not as described on the website and I did not find it useful, so I want to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately once you ship the product back to us using the prepaid return label we will send to your email.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and will send the product back today.
We have received the returned product and your refund has been processed. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 3-5 working days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can help you with.
As there has been no further response, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
